Description

Entering the Property the to a small Entranceway, Stairs lead to the communal Hall which provides access to the rest of the Property. The property comprises of Two Large Double Bedrooms, both benefiting from built in Storage and Shower-room with three piece sanitary suite. The Living Area is spacious and also provides an open plan Dining Area. This space leads onto the Fully Fitted Modern Kitchen including all Appliances.

The Property is located in the Newton Mearns area of Glasgow. Local Supermarkets and Shops are less than 5 minutes away. There is easy access to the M77 Motorway and great public Transport links are close by with Patterton and Whitecraigs Train Stations a short distance away and Buses running regularly from Ayr Road.

Council Tax Band - D

EPC - D

Deposit - £950

Landlord Registration - pending

About the agent

Penny Lane Homes Ltd, Paisley

3a Moss Street, Paisley, PA1 1BG

Penny Lane Homes is a professional established Letting and Estate Agent, whose ambition is to deliver clients with a stress-free managed property letting service and a fixed price estate agency service at a very affordable price. We provide a comprehensive single point service to meet all your needs with expert help and advice.

Having been in business since 2004 you will be safe in the hands of a reputable and established agent.
